qas.question: How many Muslim nations require women to cover their legs, shoulders, or whole body?
What are the restrictions on the dress of Muslim women considered in the West?
Why do some Muslims oppose allowing women to reveal more of themselves?

answers.text: women to reveal too much in order to be deemed attractive

qas.question: In its most strict style what must a woman cover in some Muslim nations?
Who are required to cover their bodies throughout the Muslim world?
In what part of the world do Muslims find these restrictions oppressive and sexist?

plausible_answers.text: reveal too much in order to be deemed attractive

qas.question: What do westerners believe the media pressures women to do?

plausible_answers.text: whole body apart from the face.

qas.question: What type of covering is required of women when living in the West?
